instructions: Peel and slice apples
Combine apples and water in a pan
Sift together dry ingredients
Cut in margarine until mixture is crumbly
Sprinkle mixture over apples
Bake for 40 minutes at 350F
name: Apple Crisp

instructions: Chop chicken, combine with tomatoes (including liquid) and seasonings in a skillet
Cook and stir until most of the liquid is evaporated, 6-8 minutes
Brush tortillas with oil and sprinkle with cheese
Put chicken mixture on top of tortillas, then cook at 350F until tortillas are crips and cheese is melted, 15-18 minutes
Top with cabbage and serve
name: Baked Chicken Chalupas

instructions: Heat 5 tbsp margarine in a pot over medium-high heat, then add 7 tbsp flour and stir until golden brown, about 2 minutes
Add garlic powder and sausage, and heat until thick
Slowly stir in cashew milk, bring to a boil, and then reduce heat and stir until gravy thickens
Season with pepper and salt, and set aside on low heat
Combine 1 cup cashew milk with lemon juice, and let stand for 10 minutes
Combine 2.5 cups flour, baking powder, baking soda, and a pinch of salt in a medium bowl
Add chilled margarine and cut into flour using the back of a fork, until margarine is pea sized and mixture is crumbly
Add lemon juice mixture and combine until dough becomes tacky (not sticky), adding more flour if needed
Place dough on a floured surgace, patting about 1 inch thick
Fold dough onto itself 3 times, then flatten to 3/4 inch thick
Using a 2.5 in. cookie cutter, cut biscuits out WITHOUT TWISTING
Place biscuits on a greased baking sheet and bake at 425F for 15-18 minutes
name: Biscuits and Gravy

instructions: Drain and rinse beans, then bake for 15 minutes at 325F, until slightly dried out
Combine olive oil, chopped pepper, chopped onion, and minced garlic in a skillet
Heat over medium heat until peppers and onions are soft, 5-6 minutes
Combine vegetable mixture, cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, smoked paprika, bread crumbs, cheese, mashed sweet potato, worcestershire, ketchup, and a pinch of salt and pepper into a large bowl
Mix well, then add beans and mash with a fork
Form patties from 1/3 cup of the mixture
Bake patties for 10 minutes on each side at 375F
name: Black Bean Burgers

instructions: Heat 1 tbsp olive oil over medium-high heat
Add diced chicken breast and cook through
Add olive oil and broccoli to chicken, and cook until broccoli softens
Combine water, soy sauce, rice vinegar, cornstarch, honey, garlic, and ginger to make a sauce
Combine sauce and chicken and heat until sauce is thickened
Remove from heat, stir in sesame oil, and garnish with green onions and sesame seeds
name: Broccoli Chicken Stir Fry

instructions: Combine all ingredients and mix thoroughly
Serve over lettuce with croutons
name: Caesar Salad Dressing

instructions: Chop chicken, sprinkle with cayenne and salt, and brown in pan over medium-high heat
Add sliced sausage, chopped onion, chopped green pepper, and chopped celery to same pan. Cook over medium heat for 3 minutes
Add garlic to pan, and cook for 1 additional minute
Add tomatoes and chicken to pan, and bring to a boil
Reduce heat and simmer while covered for 1 hour
Cook spaghetti according to instructions
Remove chicken from pan, shred meat with fork, and return to pan
Simmer for 8-10 minutes uncovered
Skim fat, then serve with spaghetti
name: Cajun Chicken and Spaghetti

instructions: Combine all ingredients and mix until combined. Do not overmix!
Roll dough until 1/2 inch thick, then cut donut shapes out
Melt Crisco in a pan until very hot
Fry donuts in Crisco, moving constantly to prevent sticking
Remove donuts when they have risen and are golden brown, and place on paper towel to absorb excess oil
name: Cake Donuts

instructions: Heat 3 tbsp olive oil in medium skillet
Add chopped onion and saute over medium heat until tender, about 5 minutes
Add garlic and sautee 1 more minute
Stir in tomates, 1 tsp salt, and 1/2 tsp pepper and cook over medium heat until liquid thickens, about 10 minutes
Remove from heat and add vinegar and julienned basil
Brush salmon with olive oil, season with salt and pepper, and bake at 450F until cooked through, about 12 minutes
name: Cherry Tomato Salmon

instructions: Whisk together soy sauce, rice vinegar, oil, honey, garlic, ginger, and cornstarch
Heat oil over medium heat, and cook diced chicken through
Pour sauce over chicken and simmer until sauce has thickened
Garnish with sesame seeds and green onions
name: Chicken Teriyaki

instructions: Halve each chicken breast
Heat olive oil in a skillet on high heat until very hot, about 1 minute
Reduce heat to medium and cook chicken through, seasoning both sides generously with salt and pepper
Set chicken aside
Melt margarine in the skillet, stir in flour and chicken broth and heat until simmering
Stir in green onions and chile powder
Add chicken to skillet and heat until warm
name: Chipotle Gravy Chicken

instructions: Add margarine, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, and water to mixing bowl and beat till creamy
Add eggs, flour, baking soda, salt, and chocolate chips and mix thoroughly
Form dough into balls and bake at 375F for 10-12 minutes
name: Chocolate Chip Cookies

instructions: Dice all vegetables (no need to peel)
Toss with salt, lemon juice, and oil
name: Chopped Salad

instructions: Heat oil and margarine over medium heat in large saucepan
Add shallots and cook over medium heat for 4 minutes
Add stock and bring to boil
Add couscous, 1 tsp salt, and 1/2 tsp pepper and cover
Steam off heat for 10 minutes
Toast pine nutes in a small skillet over medium heat until browned
Stir in peas, shredded mint, and toasted pine nuts
name: Couscous with Peas and Mint

instructions: Combine chili garlic sauce, soy sauce, and brown sugar into a bowl
Cook pork in a skillet until browned
Add sauce mixture and chopped peanuts to skillet and simmer for 5 minutes
Cook ramen noodles according to instructions
Toss noodles and sauce, garnish with green onions
name: Dragon Noodles

ingredients.name: Soy Sauce
ingredients.quantity: 1 tbsp (This isn't very salty. Bump to 2+?)

instructions: Heat 1 tsp oil in large pan over high heat
Add broccoli, mushrooms, and bell pepper to pan, and cook until tender (5-6 minutes)
Remove vegetables from heat, cover, and set aside
Add chicken and 1 tbsp oil to pan on high heat
Cook chicken through, then add garlic and vegetables
Whisk together chicken broth, sugar, soy sauce, sesame oil, and cornstarch
Pour sauce over chicken mixture, and simmer until sauce thickens
name: Garlic Chicken Stir Fry

instructions: Toss broccoli florets with olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper on a baking sheet
Roast at 450F until edges are crispy, about 20 minutes
name: Garlic Roasted Broccoli

instructions: Combine water, sriracha, soy sauce, garlic, sugar, and honey in a saucepan, and bring to boil
Whisk together 2 tbsp cornstarch and 2 tbsp water until dissolved, and add to saucepan. Reduce to low heat
Dice chicken and coat in cornstarch
Heat oil in a skillet, and sautee coated chicken
Combine chicken and sauce, and add red peppers to taste
name: Honey Sriracha Chicken

instructions: Mix margarine, powdered sugar, and 1 cup flour
Pat into 8x8 pan and bake until at 350F until edges brown, about 20 minutes
Mix eggs, 2 tbsp flour, baking power, sugar, lemon juice, and lemon rind and pour onto crust
Bake for 25 more minutes at 350F, careful not to let the topping brown
name: Lemon Bars

instructions: Line baking sheet with a large piece of foil, big enough to fold over to cover salmon
Melt margarine over medium-low heat, then add garlic and cook 1 minute
Remove from heat, then add lemon juice and brown sugar
Place salmon on the lined baking sheet, season with salt and pepper, and sprinkle with 1 tbsp parsley and dill
Arrange lemon slices on top of the salmon
Fold the foil over the salmon to completely cover and seal it
Bake at 375F for 12-15 minutes until done
Broil for 2-3 minutes on medium heat
Garnish with 1 tbsp parsley
name: Lemon Butter Garlic Salmon

instructions: Mix 1 cup hot water with sugar and stir until dissolved
Add lemon juice to sugar mixture
Add cold water to create a total volume of 1 gallon
Chill
name: Lemonade

instructions: Brown chicken in skillet and drain excess fat
Stir in minced garlic, chopped onion, hoisin sauce, soy sauce, rice vinegar, grated ginger, and sriracha
Cook until onions become translucent, 1-2 minutes
Add diced water chestnuts and chopped green onion to skillet
Cook another 1-2 minutes until water chestnuts are tender
Serve mixture in a leaf of butter lettuce
name: Lettuce Wraps

instructions: Mix sugar, margarine, and evaporated milk over medium heat until sugar dissolves
Boil for 5 minutes, stirring constantly
Remove pan from heat and add marshmallow cream and chocolate chips
Stir until chocolate is dissolved
Pour into greased pan and let cool in refrigerator
name: Marshmallow Fudge

instructions: Place garlic, thyme, 2 tbsp salt, and 1 tsp pepper in a food processor and process until finely minced
Add panko, lemon zest, olive oil, and margarine and pulse to moisten bread flakes
In a separate bowl, whisk together mustard and wine
Pat chicken dry with paper towels and sprinkle generously with salt and pepper
Dip each piece of chicken in mustard mixture to coat completely, then place skin side down in crumb mixture
Bake chicken crumb side up for 40 minutes at 350F, then raise heat to 400F for another 10 minutes
name: Mustard Roasted Chicken

instructions: Cut hot dogs into 1 inch cylinders, and poke uncooked spaghetti through hot dog cylinders
Cook hot dogs with spaghetti per directions on spaghetti package
name: Noodle Weenie Dogs

instructions: Combine orange juice, soy sauce, sriracha, honey, sesame oil, and red pepper flakes in a small saucepan
Simmer sauce until thickened, adding cornstarch (about 1 tsp) if needed
Cut chicken into 1 inch pieces and coat in cornstarch
Heat canola oil in a skillet until hot, then add chicken and cook through
Add sauce to chicken and simmer until hot, about 2 minutes
name: Orange Chicken

instructions: Dice unpeeled potatoes into 1 inch cubes
Toss potatoes with olive oil, paprika, rosemary, parsley, thyme, basil, and salt, pepper
Roast on a baking sheet for 30-35 minutes at 425F
name: Oven Roasted Potatoes

instructions: Whisk 1/4 cup soy sauce, olive oil, 1/2 cup lime juice, and 1 tbsp brown sugar together
Marinate chicken in soy sauce mixture for 30 minutes
Bake marinated chicken at 400F until cooked through, about 20 minutes
Combine shredded cabbage, red pepper, carrots, green onion, cilantro, and peanuts in a large bowl
In a small bowl, whisk together peanut butter, garlic, red pepper flakes,  1 tbsp soy sauce, vinegar, 1 tbsp brown sugar, and 1 lime's lime juice until smooth
Add water to dressing until at desired consistency
Shred chicken, toss with salad and dressing, and serve cold
name: Peanut Chicken Salad

instructions: Line a baking dish with a large piece of aluminum foil
Spray the foil with baking spray and place 2 sprigs of rosemary and slices of one lemon along the middle of the foil
Place salmon in the foil
Drizzle salmon with olive oil and sprinkle with salt, pepper, and minced garlic, rubbing to coat
Pour juice of second lemon over salmon
Fold foil up to create a tent over and around the salmon
Bake at 375 until cooked through, 15-20 minutes
Uncover salmon and broil until the top of the salmon becomes golden brown, about 3 minutes
name: Rosemary Lemon Salmon

instructions: Roast bacon for 15-20 minutes at 400F
Combine avocado, lime juice, scallions, red onion, jalapeno, garlic, 1 tsp salt, and 1/2 tsp pepper in a mixing bowl and mash with a fork
Coat salmon on both sides with olive oil, then sprinkle with salt and pepper
Cook salmon at high heat for 2 minutes, skin side up
Flip the salmon and cook for 2 additional minutes
Place salmon on a plate and cover with aluminum foil for 10 minutes
Cut ciabatta rolls in half, then toast cut side up for 5-10 minutes in the oven
Each sandwich should be assembled from a ciabatta roll, a salmon filet, 2 slices of bacon, 2 tbsp of guacamole, arugula, and a sprinkling of salt
name: Salmon and Guacamole Sandwiches

instructions: Combine water, margarine, and cocoa powder in saucepan and bring to a boil
Remove from heat and stir in powdered sugar until desired consistency is achieved
name: Silky Chocolate Frosting

instructions: Mix bread crumbs, cheese, and pepper in a bowl
Put melted margarine in another bowl, dip chicken in margarine and then coat with crumb mixture
Place chicken in a greased baking pan and sprinkle with remaining crumbs
Bake at 400F until cooked through, about 20 minutes
name: Spicy Chicken Nuggets

instructions: Mix all ingredients together
Cover and cook slowly for about 1 hour, until peas are very soft
Force through coarse sieve
Return to heat and bring to a boil
name: Split Pea Soup

instructions: Dice celery and onions, and sautee one day prior. Save celery leaves
Peel, boil, and cube the potatoes. Set aside some potato water
Cube the sandwich loaf and roast at 250F until crisp on the outside, but still soft inside
Combine bread, potatoes, onions, celery, and leaves
Add eggs, potato water, chicken broth, poultry seasoning, salt, pepper, and sage
Stir and adjust seasonings to taste (should look greenish from the seasonings)
Coat a baking dish with margarine and add stuffing. Add 2 tbsp margarine on top
Cover with foil and bake for 1 hr at 350F, uncovering for the last 10 minutes
name: Stuffing

instructions: Dice the onions and tomatoes
De-stem kale, and chop into small strips
Add all ingredients but kale and coconut milk to a medium pot and bring to a boil
Reduce heat and simmer covered for 20-30 minutes, until lentils are soft
Remove from heat, add chopped kale and coconut milk
name: Lentil and Kale Soup
